About the Company: Swadeshi polytex Ltd was incorporated in March `70, it was promoted by the Swadeshi Cotton Mills Company. Swadeshi Polytex Ltd. manufactures polyester staple fiber, polyester chips and filament yarn. The Company markets polyester staple fiber under the brand name "Jailene." The capacity of plant is 36000 metric tone per annum. It used to run on DMT technology.The company also in the business activities of Real Estate.
